rituals.title: Daily Rest
rituals.description: Sit quietly by the fire for 3–5 minutes. Breathe slowly and listen.

rituals.title: Burden Release
rituals.description: Write a short burden and release it into the fire (anonymous).

rituals.title: Gratitude List
rituals.description: Write three things you are grateful for. Read them aloud softly.

rituals.title: Ritual of Stillness
rituals.description: A 10-minute guided silence with scripture-lit prompt to rest in God.

rituals.title: Forgiveness Rite
rituals.description: A guided sequence to name hurt, ask God for help, and let go.

rituals.title: Destiny Vigil
rituals.description: Late-night vigil (20–30 min). May reveal a Destiny Line if eligible.

scripturePrompts.text: The Lord is my shepherd; I have all that I need. — (Psalm 23:1 NLT-style)
Don't be afraid — I am with you. — (Isaiah 41:10 NLT-style)
Come to me all who are weary; I will give you rest. — (Matthew 11:28 NLT-style)
